sentences.text:
[Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
Binary package hint: software-center
In the attached screenshot the black box contains a button that should say "Remove", which is only readable after text-selecting the button.
The screenshot was taken in KDE with nodoka-midnight as gtk style.
ProblemType: Bug
DistroRelease: Ubuntu 10.04
Package: software-center 1.1.26

ProcVersionSignature: Ubuntu 2.6.32-19.28-preempt 2.6.32.10+drm33.1
Uname: Linux 2.6.32-19-preempt x86_64

NonfreeKernelModules: usb_storage kvm_intel kvm btrfs zlib_deflate crc32c libcrc32c ufs qnx4 hfsplus hfs minix ntfs vfat msdos fat jfs xfs reiserfs rfcomm binfmt_misc ppdev sco bridge stp bnep l2cap nfsd exportfs nfs lockd nfs_acl auth_rpcgss sunrpc snd_hda_codec_analog isl6421 snd_hda_intel cx24123 snd_hda_codec arc4 snd_hwdep cx88_alsa cx8800 rtl8187 snd_pcm_oss snd_mixer_oss cx88_dvb cx88_vp3054_i2c videobuf_dvb dvb_core snd_pcm mac80211 cx8802 cx88xx ir_common snd_seq_dummy snd_seq_oss joydev snd_seq_midi stir4200 v4l2_common led_class hid_logitech videodev ff_memless coretemp snd_rawmidi irda cfg80211 v4l1_compat i2c_algo_bit usbhid btusb snd_seq_midi_event fbcon v4l2_compat_ioctl32 tveeprom hwmon_vid hid crc_ccitt eeprom_93cx6 bluetooth snd_seq tileblit videobuf_dma_sg btcx_risc asus_atk0110 nvidia snd_timer snd_seq_device snd font videobuf_core psmouse intel_agp serio_raw soundcore bitblit softcursor snd_page_alloc vga16fb vgastate lp parport ohci1394 floppy ieee1394 skge sky2 ahci pata_jmicron

PackageArchitecture: all
ProcEnviron:
LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
PATH=(custom, user)
LANG=en_US.UTF-8
SHELL=/bin/bash
SourcePackage: software-center
Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
The other buttons in the menus are fine, only the 'more info' page buttons are unreadable.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
nodoka midnight is available as part of the 'gtk2-engines-nodoka' package in universe.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
This has nothing to do with the theme btw.
I tested it with QtCurve and DarkRoom too and the button text color seems to be black regardless of what the theme uses for button text.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
I added a webkit task, this button is provided by webkit.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
Corresponding bug report upstream: https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
I'm working on a fix upstream.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
A fix has been merged upstream: http://trac.webkit.org/changeset/60440.

Re: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
We don't use webkit anymore

title: [Lucid] Install/Remove button in the details page unreadable with dark theme
